original_text: And over the golden altar they shall spread a cloth of blue and cover it with a covering of goatskin, and shall put in its poles.
korean_text: 금제단 위에 청색 보자기를 펴고 해달의 가죽 덮개로 덮고 그 채를 꿰고

sentences.original_text: they shall spread a cloth of blue
and cover it with a covering of goatskin
and shall put in its poles
